# Copilot Instructions for specials-agent

## Project Overview
This is a Python project using Mamba for environment management, designed for automation with Playwright.

## Development Setup
- Python environment: Mamba (conda-based)
- Testing framework: Playwright
- Code quality tools: black, flake8, mypy
- Repository: GitHub

## Coding Standards
- Use black for code formatting
- Follow flake8 linting rules
- Type hints required (checked by mypy)
- Write tests for new features using Playwright

## Project Structure
- `src/`: Source code
- `tests/`: Test files
- `environment.yml`: Mamba environment configuration
- `pyproject.toml`: Project configuration and tool settings
